gw.document

Class DocumentsUtilBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentsUtilBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentsUtilBase

    public class DocumentsUtilBase
extends Object
    Helper methods for the Document-related UI pages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DocumentAssistantEnabled
      Returns true if the Guidewire Document Assistant control is enabled, false otherwise.
      static String DocumentAssistantJnlpURL
      Returns the absolute URL of the Document Assistant JNLP launch file
      static List<Object> MimeTypes
      Returns a list of all available MIME types.
      static String ScriptResourcePlatform

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String FileUploadURL(String baseURL)
      Returns the absolute URL for file uploads
      static String UploadDocumentContentURL(String baseURL)
      Returns the absolute URL for document content uploads
      static Object deserializeXml(InputStream xml, IEntityType type)
      Returns the entity deserialized from the input stream. Note that this is mean for Document and therefore all created beans will be marked as non persisting.
      static Object deserializeXmlTo(InputStream xml, IEntityType type)
      Returns the entity deserialized from the input stream.
      static String getDocumentAssistantJnlpURL()
      Returns the absolute URL of the Document Assistant JNLP launch file
      static String getMimeTypeDescription(String mimeType)
      Returns the user-facing description for a MIME type.
      static List<Object> getMimeTypes()
      Returns a list of all available MIME types.
      static boolean isDocumentAssistantEnabled()
      Returns true if the Guidewire Document Assistant control is enabled, false otherwise.
      static boolean isDocumentEditable(Document document)
      Returns true if the contents of the given DocumentBase entity are being edited locally by the user, false otherwise.
      static IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptor(String templateId, ILocale locale)
      Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will not check if the template id is null
      static IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptorForUI(String templateId, ILocale locale)
      Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will return null if the template id is null or empty
      static String makePortableFileName(String uniqueStr)
      returns a portable file name from a unique string
      static void renderDocumentContents(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo, DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
      Render the document contents which correspond to the document creation process encapsulated in the given DocumentCreationInfo object. The rendering may stream the contents directly back to the user's machine, or create a temporary file, or follow another process, depending on the contents of the DocumentContentsInfo. See {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentProductionBase} for more information on document contents.
      static void renderDocumentContentsDirectly(String fileName, DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
      Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the user's machine.
      static InputStream serializeDocumentAsXML(Document document)
      Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
      static String serializeDocumentToXMLString(Document document)
      Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
      static boolean showEditButtons(Document document)
      Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart. It also will check the document entity to see if it is managed by DMS
      static boolean showEditButtons()
      Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart.

      • isDocumentEditable

        boolean isDocumentEditable(Document document)
        Returns true if the contents of the given DocumentBase entity are being edited locally by the user, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        document - The DocumentBase entity whose edibility is to be determined.
        Returns:
        True if the contents of the given DocumentBase entity are being edited locally by the user, false otherwise.

      • loadTemplateDescriptor

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptor(String templateId,
                                                 ILocale locale)
        Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will not check if the template id is null
        Parameters:
        templateId - template id, null value will be passed to the plugin
        locale - locale of the template
        Returns:
        descriptor

      • loadTemplateDescriptorForUI

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptorForUI(String templateId,
                                                      ILocale locale)
        Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will return null if the template id is null or empty
        Parameters:
        templateId - template ID
        locale - locale
        Returns:
        template descriptor with the given template id in the provided locale.

      • makePortableFileName

        String makePortableFileName(String uniqueStr)
        returns a portable file name from a unique string
        Parameters:
        uniqueStr - the string to turn into a path name
        Returns:
        a portable path name

      • renderDocumentContents

        void renderDocumentContents(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo,
                          DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
        Render the document contents which correspond to the document creation process encapsulated in the given DocumentCreationInfo object. The rendering may stream the contents directly back to the user's machine, or create a temporary file, or follow another process, depending on the contents of the DocumentContentsInfo. See {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentProductionBase} for more information on document contents.
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - The encapsulated information about the current document creation process.
        docInfo - The results of the document contents creation.

      • renderDocumentContentsDirectly

        void renderDocumentContentsDirectly(String fileName,
                                  DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
        Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the user's machine.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename to be used.
        docInfo - The contents of the document to be displayed.

      • serializeDocumentAsXML

        InputStream serializeDocumentAsXML(Document document)
        Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to convert to a string
        Returns:
        the object serialized to a string

      • serializeDocumentToXMLString

        String serializeDocumentToXMLString(Document document)
        Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to convert to a string
        Returns:
        the object serialized to a string

      • showEditButtons

        boolean showEditButtons(Document document)
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart. It also will check the document entity to see if it is managed by DMS
        Parameters:
        document - document entity to check
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise

      • showEditButtons

        boolean showEditButtons()
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart.
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise
